name: ABOVE THE CLOUDS - 4
description:
TO BE AT A STANDSTILL, AN INERT MASS. WE MUST ABANDON THIS METAL SHELL, HEAVY AND DEAF. A FALLEN COLOSSUS, WORN OUT AND TIRED OF WALKING STRAIGHT AHEAD. A STRAIGHT, CONSTANT, RAW JOURNEY. STOP BY FORGETTING TIME AND TRUSTING THE IMMUTABLE.
A MISTAKE TO THINK THAT THIS MATTER IS SAID TO BE IMPERISHABLE. ONE MISTAKE, ONE FAILURE, STRANDED, RUN AGROUND, IMPERCEPTIBLE STOP. HOW TO REALIZE THAT EVERYTHING HAS STOPPED WHEN YOU HAVE LIVED SO LONG WITHOUT WORRYING ABOUT MOVING FORWARD.
LETHARGY SETS IN. THE STILLNESS OF BODY AND MIND. A FEAR LOOMS AND CUTS THE MISTS. IT IS ABOUT THE CHOICE TO MOVE FORWARD OR TO CONTINUE TO THINK THAT EVERYTHING HAS ALWAYS BEEN MOVING FORWARD. THE MACHINERY HAS STALLED FOR A LONG TIME.
YOU HAVE TO EXTRACT YOURSELF FROM THE HULL, SPLIT THE WALLS, ABANDON MATTER AND HABIT FOR AN AFTERWARDS STILL WRAPPED IN A VEIL. THE NUMBNESS OF TIME, A FROSTBITE RUNNING THROUGH THE SKIN. YOU HAVE TO WARM UP, BE SHARPENED TO GO FURTHER. HOLD YOUR BREATH FOR EMOTIONAL APNEA.
